segments.text: Some people pile on their agonise and try to seek other â€™ s sympathy by telling them how miserable they are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . They take the advantage of other people's hospitality and generosity .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was fooled once . A lady told me she needed some money to keep the pot boiling . So I gave her some money and bailed her out of the situation . But later I learned that she had lied to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are still wet behind the ears . You should have seen through her .
segments.speaker: S2
